---
title: "germany_map"
format: gfm
---

`fs` for file systems

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(fs)
library(sf)
library(geodata)
```

```{r}
de_st <- gadm(
  country = "Germany", 
  path = path_temp(),
  resolution = 2
)
```

```{r}
de_st |> 
  st_as_sf() ->
  de_sf
```

```{r}
de_sf |> 
  ggplot() +
    geom_sf()+
    theme_void()
```

```{r}
library(tidygeocoder)
```

```{r}
tibble(
  city = c(
    "Hamburg",
    "Munich"
  ),
  location = str_glue(
    "{city}, Germany"
  )
) |> 
  geocode(location)-> 
  cities_df
```

```{r}
cities_df
```

```{r}
library(ggrepel)
```

```{r}
de_sf |> 
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf()+
  geom_point(
    data = cities_df, 
    aes(
      x = long,
      y = lat
    )
  )+
  geom_text_repel(
    data = cities_df, 
    aes(
      x = long,
      y = lat,
      label = city
    )
  )+
  theme_void()
```
